com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny
Class Progress

java.lang.Object
  ej.mwt.Widget
      com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny.GenericRange
          com.is2t.mwt.widgets.tiny.Progress
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObservable, IProgress, IRange, IWidget, ej.microui.Listener, ej.mwt.Renderable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Progress
public class Progress
extends GenericRange
implements IProgress

A progress bar is a widget that hold a value between zero and a positive number of steps. This value can be modified by calling progress methods.

          NOT IN API
